instruction: Given the input, make up an original idea.
input: An innovative way to reuse plastic waste.
output: An innovative way to recycle and re-use plastic waste is to create a 3D printing platform. The platform would take plastic waste and create 3D printed products such as furniture, kitchenware, decorations, and more. It would provide a way to reuse plastic waste and also create sustainable items that can be used and enjoyed by everyone.
